name: Percussive Orchestral Strings
description:
10 fully percussive string compositions for your game. The pack also contains looped versions of each track and one alternative version of Percussive Orchestral Strings 1.

Preview: https://soundcloud.com/user-85722347/sets/percussive-orchestral-strings

Features:

  • Mixed and mastered specifically for video games.
  • Fits perfectly into the gameplay.
  • Best audio quality possible.
  • Commercial use allowed

Number of Audio Wavs: 22

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44,100 Hz

Does Music Loop: Yes

Minutes of Audio Provided: 61:24

Supported Development Platforms: All
